title: Saving Settings
body: So, every time I get into a game I have to change my settings back to quick cast. I don't really like doing this every game. Is there a fix for this that anyone knows?

replies.body:
It sounds like your input settings file stored server-side may be corrupt. I recommend completing a reset of this file with the steps below:

First, you'll want to **log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, leave the match, then hop into another one to change your input settings before leaving and hopping into another one to confirm the changes saved. Let me know if this worked for you.

If you're on Windows then you might have an issue with your config files, and failing to get it sync do the servers. Resetting your config to default should do the trick, but keep in mind you may have to redo your bindings:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Hopefully, that will do the trick!
